attributes.title: I WAS HORRIFIED
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to show my support for the best president who ever existed, only to find out that this app asked for my mobile phone number????? THAT IS A VIOLATION OF MY PRIVACY AND HUMAN RIGHTS!!! I could not have been more heartbroken and honestly scared for my life in that moment! I REFUSE TO GOVE MY MOBILE CELLULAR DEVICE NUMBER TO SOME RANDOM IT MAN THAT COULD TRACK ME AND FIND WHERE I LIVE!!!!

attributes.title: full of fake news
attributes.review: The news in this app is unreliable and not based on facts. The information is misleading to the public and carries an ideology that could be seen as domestic terrorism or at least neofascist. app is also glitchy and unreliable.

attributes.title: WHY IS THIS APP STILL UP?!
attributes.review: HORRIBLE APP! When I first opened it I saw an uglier and slightly taller version of an Oompa Loompa! Who could ever like this app?! My eyes nearly burned off! Whoever likes this app is a monster!!! The Oompa Loompa looked like a homophobic, racist pedo! Disgusting honestly! Why is this still on the App Store?! THIS CAN KILL SOMEONE ONE DAY!! TRULY DISAPPOINTED ITS STILL UP!!

attributes.title: Upset
attributes.review: I was physically hurt when opening this app and seeing the horrors inside. I can‚Äôt even go into more detail. Please we need to have this app taken down before lives of children and families are forever ruined!

attributes.title: APP IS HORIBBLE
attributes.review: first they told me  to throw my cat down the drain then they used all my storage in my phone and i have no choice to delete it. it also gave me notifications all the time 24/7. he also is a big fat cheetoh with NO CRUNCH. eww. who the hell would even vote for him.

attributes.title: Not impressed
attributes.review:
Not impressed 
There is little to no creativity 
Stolen speeches, hypocrisy, and just plain awful visuals. I am offended that this app even dare show me the face of a soggy Cheeto. 
It was EXTREMELY glitchy, and I lost literal brain cells from just downloading it. 
Awful , don‚Äôt download, it‚Äôs not worth it.
